page.title: 10LIVING NEAR THE AIRPORT
page.content: Life near the Airport is constantly disrupted by aeroplanes arriving and departing at all hours of the day and night. When I and my family first moved into the area,I thought nothing of it, but then I realised how near I was.For the first year I had trouble sleeping and I couldn't concentrate when doing my work.We ended up burning out the television trying to drown out the noise! We haven't any pets as we are frightened that they may suffer from the noise and get injured by running into the Airport grounds. On the other hand,there are advantages.I travel a lot in my work and it is great being only a few moments from your home. Overall,life here is pretty good!
